krpano.title: 汇丰商学院

scene.name: scene_001
scene.title: 大楼门口

hotspot.name: spot3
hotspot.onclick: if(linkedscene, tween(scale,0.25,0.5); tween(oy,-20,0.5); tween(alpha,0,0.5); looktohotspot(); loadscene(get(linkedscene),null,MERGE,BLEND(1)); skin_updatescroll(); );
